metadata.dc:description: OBJECTIVE To describe an atypical presentation of von Hippel-Lindau disease. MATERIAL AND METHODS We present the clinical, diagnostic and treatment of the urological signs of this disease, which has overcoat a neurological management, in a young man with familiar history of it. CONCLUSIONS The basic knowledge of the von Hippel-Lindau disease is important for the urologist because the urological signs of it, are common and they make up one of the most important causes of morbility and mortality.
metadata.dc:title: Enfermedad de von Hippel-Lindau: una presentación atípica.
[Von Hippel-Lindau disease: atypical presentation].
